## Block.getRecord() method

Gets the record associated with the specified offset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRecord(offset?: number): Record;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  offset | number | _(Optional)_ The offset to retrieve the record from. Default is 0. |

**Returns:**

[Record](./forms42core.record_2.md)

The record associated with the specified offset.
